abstract: Louis Schlamowitz has a closet full of autographs, including cards and pictures from the late Libyan dictator. A Christmas card thanked Mr. Schlamowitz, who is Jewish, for his "friendship through the years."
snippet: Louis Schlamowitz has a closet full of autographs, including cards and pictures from the late Libyan dictator. A Christmas card thanked Mr. Schlamowitz, who is Jewish, for his "friendship through the years."
lead_paragraph: To say Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi was a special pen pal of Louis Schlamowitz would be stretching the truth.
